basic.description: In this course, students develop the practical skills needed to successfully complete a teaching portfolio using Chalk and Wire, reflect on prerequisite coursework and associated field experiences, and set goals for future internship experiences.
basic.subject: ISC
basic.title: Accomplished Practices in Science Teaching

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EDF 4210, EDF 4430, EDG 4321, RED 4335, and TSL 4324.
